language.entry: "Nothing COMPARES to it... Just what made it so delectable?"
On Ranged Attack Hit: {colour_start|move}Shuffle{colour_end} Target {colour_start|skill_unselectable}(100%% base){colour_end}
On Being Hit: {colour_start|bleed}Bleed{colour_end} 2 pts/tn for 2 tns {colour_start|skill_unselectable}(+1 pt per Difficulty){colour_end}
-25%% {colour_start|stress}Stress{colour_end} Received if has less than 2 {colour_start|hexer_vial}Corruption Vials{colour_end}
On Friendly Skill: Other Heroes: Gain {colour_start|symptom}Symptom:{colour_end} {colour_start|quirk_rictus}Rictus Imperfectus{colour_end} {colour_start|skill_unselectable}(45%% Chance){colour_end}
{colour_start|skill_unselectable}A grin cracks the face in two, warping thoughts towards sadism and hunger.{colour_end}
On Attack: Other Heroes +3 {colour_start|stress}Stress{colour_end} if not {colour_start|afflicted}Afflicted{colour_end}
On Attack: {colour_start|buff}Buff Others:{colour_end} +5%% ACC, +3%% CRIT, -33%% {colour_start|stress}Stress{colour_end} Inflicted On Party if {colour_start|afflicted}Afflicted{colour_end}
Is banned from the Amber Refinery and Tek Exchange
50% Chance to Forcibly Interact with Corpse Curios
I'm STARVING, yes? I'm here to HELP you out. Let me accompany your SLAUGHTER in these foul lands.

With the power of his Evil Blood, the Hexer can melt down his enemies’ flesh, mind, and resistances. He has the power to cripple entire groups at once in various ways, both to enfeeble their assault and corrode their defenses. If necessary, he can also defend his allies against enemy hexes.

Fueled by his Evil Blood, the Hexer turns his own vital fluids into a lethal weapon. The greater his hatred and hunger, the more powerful it evolves. Though he has never gotten rid of his Straitjacket, it seems as if it’s protecting him not from himself, but from others instead. And none dare surmise that his leathery cloak breathes as if alive.

The Hexer is insane, malevolent, and solitary. Gorging himself on the fresh kills of past battles keeps him going for more. With his fiendish resilience and control over his blood, disease has no hold on him either, and he can hone it to amplify his curses. And should he come close to falling, the accursed serum he hates so much may prove beneficial.
I will DEVOUR their flesh and souls!
These restraints can't contain my POWER!
And after I'm done with you, the REST is next.
Your SPINE will be picked and cleaned, piece by piece.
You shall DISSOLVE into a puddle of gore.
Your rotting, necrotic tissue is so BEAUTIFUL.
Scream out in AGONY as you melt alive.
Your screams are a HYMN for the dead!
You will DROWN in your own boiling blood!
I shall STRANGLE you with your own intestines!
Kill them ALREADY, that I may feast...
I've thoroughly seasoned my enemies with DESPAIR. Now to end them.
I can't wait to sink my TEETH into their throats. Finish them...
My fluids, OOZING out of my body...
Fool! You will only EMPOWER me!
You dare spill my IMPLEMENT of your demise?
My blood CONGEALS in my veins.
On others, I would call this SEASONING.
The itch returns, and it is UNBEARABLE.
I can't wait to finally SINK my teeth into something...
Stop EXPERIMENTING on me! My blood holds no secrets to you!
You're looking after your KING? Good.
I will build a THRONE out of your bones!
A king does not FORGIVE unruly meals so easily...
Surely you are a WORTHY subject?
Such weakness in front of your KING.
More meals for me, served on a PLATTER.
I do not care if TIME bends on itself, as long as I get to feast!
So much fodder for me to unleash my MALEVOLENCE on!
Gyihihi! Back to inflict UNTOLD suffering...
You are a dead BITCH before me, now.
I can't see... I can't SEE...
I demand the first MORSEL of flesh.
You are looking mighty APPETIZING, gyihihi...
Should you be killed, I will put your CORPSE to good use.
Oh, so you are a SURVIVOR after all.
A damn SHAME I won't be tasting you.
And here I am, wondering just how SALTY your flesh is.
I've waited so LONG for this moment...
At last, what I came here for. Fresh and old KILL.
DINNER is prepared for me? Wonderful...
You know it's RUDE to watch others eat? Gyihihi...
Livers and brains, tongues and thighs... DELICIOUS.
Ugh, to be REDUCED into using this.
You can't MAKE me... I'm doing this voluntarily.
Know your place, and GROVEL at my feet.
I shall RULE over all, and turn the weak into meals.
Time to STALK for prey... Hihihi.
I will blend in with these MONSTERS.
Time for a MIDNIGHT tour of my kingdom-to-be.
You better get back into the fray, lest you DISAPPOINT your king...
Would you rather face ME or them? Heehee.
Think of how much your ALLIES need you. What would happen to them otherwise?
Aah, some ripened CARRION! A perfect snack.
Just partaking of this DESPAIRING odor of yours is revitalizing...
Excellent, there's still MARROW to be had in these bones.
Unusual hungers and delight in misery...
{colour_start|skill_unselectable}On Turn Start: Party: Receive 4 Stress (8%% Chance){colour_end}
{colour_start|skill_unselectable}On Turn Start: Party: Receive 4 Stress (4%% Chance){colour_end}
{colour_start|skill_unselectable}On Hexer Corruption Vial Consumption: Buff Self:{colour_end}
A maniacal grin shows teeth stained crimson...
{colour_start|skill_unselectable}On Turn Start: Party: Receive 4 Stress (15%% Chance){colour_end}
{colour_start|skill_unselectable}On Turn Start: Party: Receive 4 Stress (8%% Chance){colour_end}
{colour_start|skill_unselectable}On Hexer Corruption Vial Consumption: Buff Self:{colour_end}
At last! Something to SATE this hunger...!
Such a delicious and ripe AROMA. Let me through!
I'm absolutely FAMISHED. Only this will do.
If you find my grin unsettling, just stop staring.
Oh, your suffering brings me such joy!
Watching you wretches die is simply RAPTUROUS!
The hunger the hunger the hunger the HUNGER...
My blood is a vessel to DIVINITY!
A whiff of HEAVEN with every wound I smell.
I demand the BEST cut of their innards!
Please! I can't take this anymore! The hunger is killing me!
My blood boils! It hurts so much, make it stop!
I don't know how much longer until I give in to these dark thoughts!
Are my thoughts even my own anymore?! Ahahaha!
{colour_start|notable}{?hero_name}%s{colour_end}'s symptoms have worsened, resulting in {colour_start|quirk_rictus}Rictus Mortis{colour_end}.
{colour_start|notable}{?hero_name}%s{colour_end}'s disease has grown more virulent, losing its stabilization.
I almost became lost to... That thing.
Promise me that if it gets worse again, you'll put me out of my misery.
(cracks a grin from ear to ear)
I have to admit, I'm PECKISH. Heehee!
My burning blood suddenly feels so EUPHORIC. Ahaha!
Aaah, finally I feel like MYSELF again!
Life had gotten dull without these GRUESOME visions.
I almost became lost to... That thing.
Promise me that if it gets worse again, you'll put me out of my misery.
You EXPECT me to do what?
You are foolish to think I would WASTE my time here.
Use those shriveled BRAINS of yours.
So HUNGRY. Send me out so I can eat.
Let me out of this ship, that I may GORGE myself on fresh kill.
Your king is STARVING. I demand a royal entourage and a trip into the Weald.
I'm SLAVERING here. I need to slake myself on blood and flesh.
Ooooh, so hungry, so so so SO HUNGRY!
They can NEVER put me back in that institute!
They can not destroy me! Through my blood, I am IMMORTAL!
Such EXOTIC meals await me here!
To feel this arid breeze... It makes me THIRSTY, gyehehe.
Bah, these DESSICATED remains are barely a proper meal.
I better not get SAND where it itches. Ugh.
I won't make any PROMISE to hold back. Gyihihi.
You are BOLD to send me in here. Hihihi!
They may lose a POUND of flesh or three by the end.
To the VICTOR go the bloody spoils, yes?
What do you mean, BITING is foul play?
It's not my fault they didn't PROTECT their eyes.
Hmmm. You're a little too THIN for my taste.
You don't need their FINGER back, do you?
Finally, some LUXURY for your king.
Excellent! Your past TRANSGRESSIONS are waived.
I've heard good things about this AMBER. I am eager to find out, heehee.
It won't sate this HUNGER, but it's the second best thing!
Now THIS is worth my time! Gyahahaha!
Such EUPHORIA! I can feel my veins burning!
Where's your menu? I would like my meat as RAW as it gets.
ALCOHOL? Bah, that's bad for the blood.
I can get my steak SAIGNANT? Lovely.
But I don't even have my HANDS!
If only I still had my FORTUNE.
Are these dice made of BONE? Asking for no reason.
DON'T YOU DARE RESTRAIN ME AGAIN!
I REFUSE TO RETURN TO A PLACE SO SIMILAR!
YOU SHALL PAY FOR SENDING YOUR KING IN HERE!
I don't need this medicine. My blood is PURE.
I am perfectly capable of curing MYSELF.
This SHODDY excuse of a nurse is supposed to treat me?
This PALES in comparison to a fresh kill seasoned with suffering.
The next person to suggest me a beer will PERISH.
Actually, most vegetables and fruits are FANTASTIC for your blood pressure.
Do you dare BET a pound of flesh? Hahaha...
Why is it so DIFFICULT to find someone to play knife games?
I'll WAGER what's left of my soul, to get rid of it. Gyihihihi!
I WILL MURDER ALL OF YOU!
YOUR DEATH WILL BE SLOW AND CRUEL AS I EAT YOU ALIVE!
Your syringes and leeches shall not DEFILE my blood.
I will GUT you with your own tools, hideous wretch.
You think you can CURE me? You are far too weak.
Don't you DARE send me there.
If you're trying to kill me, you'll find the results very UNPLEASANT.
Even if I PERISH, I shall reform and return.
I demand a QUALITY cut of meat, not this rubbish.
I wish to ENJOY their suffering, not bore myself.
There is that special delight in watching the strong COWER before you.
You challenge a KING? I need no champions, I will LIQUEFY you myself.
...Gyi? Is that a SERPENT I hear approaching?
Guard your king! I refuse to become a meal to these scaled PESTS.
Something large stirs UNDERNEATH me? I hope it's palatable.
You're making your RULER walk like a fool. I will have your heads for this.
I can feel them staring - one THOUSAND eyes!
Is it all of you who are INSANE?! Or is it me?
Did it get a bit DARKER just now?
To blend IN with my surroundings...
Aaaah, my cloak FLUTTERS in delight.
I can SENSE it - yes, yes!
Soon we will feed, my BEAUTIFUL cloak.
I can taste so much FILTH in the air...
Let's find some things to EAT.
Leave me some SPACE in these corridors.
I didn't come here to WATCH grass grow.
If only there were more MEAT to find around here.
I am falling ASLEEP here, yes?
Let go of me! This ship is FULL of victims!
So much MEALS just passing by... Gyihihi!
The STENCH of all these peasants is mouth-watering.
This hunger can not be SATIATED!
I can't SEE, but I can SMELL deliciously rancid meals.
The hunger... I can't WITHHOLD it anymore!
I smell, I feel, I sense... a BANQUET of terror-seasoned flesh.
I've been STARVING for so long. No longer! Gyihihihi!
I'll get my POUND of flesh, my cut of organs, my pint of blood.
Get this damned SERUM out of me!
TO BRING AN END UPON MYSELF...!
And I will CACKLE as I devour your flesh...
Oh, how TASTY your wounds look.
You can not RESTRAIN my hunger for long!
I can't wait to SATIATE this craving!
I will work my way UP from the liver to your lungs!
My saliva OOZES like a pus-filled wound...
Your voice is NOTHING compared to that of my hunger.
Your blood is IMPURE, yes. You have no say over me!
I will rip you apart if you try COMMANDING me once more.
My blood BOILS OVER. I can't hold it in, hyihihi...
Your BLOOD, it speaks to me... Yes!
Fester and rot, that I may SAVOUR your remains.
Your sorrow and fear is like a fine SPICE.
To see you STAINED in blood... Exquisite...
I will tear out your ORGANS and taste them!
I shall make your blood SPILL and add it to my own.
I will devour your EYEBALLS first!
I shall GNAW on your spine until nothing remains!
Go out and FEAST, blood of mine!
I must LET my blood to taste you better.
Do not part a KING from its MEAL.
Deny me my meal and face the PUNISHMENT I have in store for you...
The FUTURE holds pain for you!
The more you spill my blood, the more POWERFUL I become.
Yes, yes, yes! EMPTY their veins for me!
Go for the HEART and tear it out! Gihahaha!
Slash out their GUTS and strangle them with them!
Your whiff ruins the SEASONING of fear.
You lack a BITE. You are woefully placid.
You are BLIND by your sorrows.
To THINK that I would allow a tasty morsel to pass by.
I will GNASH on your flesh as you pass.
Instead, FEED me freshly chopped kidney.
This isn't RIPE enough for me.
I can't bear these restrains! My eyes ITCH!
I will RAKE out their eyes and lick the gaping holes... Yes...!
Are there any ROTTING remains here?
Let me through, I must SEEK for spoiled carcasses!
Allow me a TASTE of this. Gyihihi!
SUFFER and shriek in fear and agony!
I will tear your HAND clean off your wrist.
I must CONSUME all that remains. Gyehehe.
To gorge myself on your SPLEEN...
Only GORE can satisfy my hunger.
I crave for INNARDS, not this peasant's placebo.
I refuse to chew anything that is not GRISTLE.
How delightfully ripe for the taking!
Let me quiet that gurgling of my gut so you cease whining about it.
Spoils of some sort for your king, at last. Heehee!
Something to feast on during this famine!
SILENCE at once, you failed court jester!
Aaah, my heart beats in the THRILL.
The mind is STRONG, but the flesh is weak?
I will BATHE in the shower of gore!
This will be EASY. I can already taste them, gihihi...
My stomach ACHES. I can't bear this!
Your KING is... not so sure, actually! Geh!
What, you expect a MOTIVATIONAL quip?
Pfeh. Get in there and slay them before I slay YOU intead.
Yes, yes, a FINE job preparing my meal.
Why am I surrounded by an entourage of SIMPLETONS?
My next DECREE will be to whip you into shape.
You are too WEAK to protect your king!
Oooh, you've seasoned them with FEAR.
Playing with your food? I quite LIKE that.
You extend their SUFFERING? How evil. Gyahaha!
The strong will feast on the weak. And you're WEAK!
That's not how to PREPARE my future meal at all, you blockhead.
My OWN body is suddenly so appetizing?
Excellent, the HOWLING is back. Grrr.
Spare the SCIENCE. My blood is stronger!
You better be CAREFUL with administering that. Gyihi!
